original_text: I will take them into this land, where there is plenty of food and drink, enough for everyone. It is the land that I promised to give to their ancestors. When they live there, they will eat as much food as they want. They will be fat and healthy. But then they will start to worship other gods. They will turn against me. They will not obey the covenant that I made with them.
korean_text: 내가 그들의 조상들에게 맹세한 바 젖과 꿀이 흐르는 땅으로 그들을 인도하여 들인 후에 그들이 먹어 배부르고 살찌면 돌이켜 다른 신들을 섬기며 나를 멸시하여 내 언약을 어기리니

sentences.original_text: I will take them into this land
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 이 땅으로 인도할 것이다

sentences.original_text: where there is plenty of food and drink
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에는 풍부한 음식과 마실 것이 있다

sentences.original_text: they will eat as much food as they want
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 원하는 만큼 음식을 먹을 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will be fat and healthy
But then they will start to worship other gods
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 다른 신들을 섬기기 시작할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will not obey the covenant
